edu.ohiou.labimp.table
Class ModelTable

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTable
                  edu.ohiou.labimp.table.ModelTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.CellEditorListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, javax.swing.event.TableColumnModelListener, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class ModelTable
extends javax.swing.JTable

Class ModelTable provides visual representation for any AbstractTableModel. It is particularly useful for displaying SquareTabelModel and RectangularTableModel

Description:

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003

Company: Ohio University

Version:
1.0
Author:
Dusan Sormaz

ModelTable

public ModelTable(javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel model)
Constructor for a given AbstractTabelModel. ModelTable is enabled by default

display

public void display()
Displays this table with default title (string representation of the table's AbstractTableModel. Calls other method for display

display

public void display(java.lang.String title)
Displays the ModelTable with a given title. Sets GUIApplet on field panel and displays it

Parameters:
title - String the title to be shown in the display

public void init()
